data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Istanbul.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Istanbul, Turkey
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 5,312 believers find a person of peace today among the 14,155,186 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Istanbul to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Istanbul, Turkey.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Herki people.
Spirit, please convict the believers in Istanbul, Turkey to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
Spirit, teach the 5,312 believers in Istanbul that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 5,312 believers in Istanbul to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

location.name: Istanbul
